rules_text:
[i]Paradox[/i] – Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, put X study counters on Final Project, where X is that spell's mana value.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are twenty or more study counters on Final Project, you win the game.
{1}{R}: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
